Content-Type: text/plain;

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Deemos follows Diesel. Arrow speeds up to a parking lot. He transforms to r=
obot mode.

Arrow: This is my grand opportunity. I made an explosive exit l=
ast time...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: LurkerAbyss
  To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 8:17 PM
  Subject: Re:=
 Secret Messages


                                                        =
                                                            : : Sting : :

=
                                                                           =
                       Sting:  Alright, let's head out.

                  =
                                     He transforms into a scorpion vehicle.=
  Basically, a scorpion on wheels.  He follows Diesel and company.
    ----=
- Original Message ----- 
    From: RoboRick007 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 2:10 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret =
Messages


    : : Diesel : :

    Diesel: Great, glad to have you with us.=


    He transformes back to truck mode.

    Diesel: Lets continue on our =
way!

    He continues to drive on.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
   From: LurkerAbyss 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesd=
ay, August 14, 2002 1:47 PM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


          =
                                                                           =
                                  : : Sting : :

                          =
                                                                    Sting s=
miles, and nods, acknowledging the offer.

                                =
                                                              Sting:  It wo=
uld be a pleasure to aid you all.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
     From: RoboRick007 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: W=
ednesday, August 14, 2002 12:43 AM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


 =
       : : Diesel : :

        Diesel takes Sting's hand and shakes it. Die=
sel had excepted Sting, he was not a enemie.

        Diesel: I have a prop=
osition for you, Sting. We are on our way to Earth, of the past, through th=
e Transwarp rift. We plan to build a great army. Would you like to join us?=


        Diesel waited for a reply.
          ----- Original Message -----=
 
          From: LurkerAbyss 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      =
    Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:06 AM
          Subject: Re: Secret=
 Messages


                                                               =
                                                           : : Sting : :

 =
                                                                           =
                          Sting nods and then smiles a bit.
              
=
                                                                           =
                      Sting:  It's a pleasure to meet you all.

           =
                                                                        He =
extends his arm and hand out to Diesel, for a handshake.
            ----- =
Original Message ----- 
            From: RoboRick007 
            To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:58 PM
   =
         Subject: Re: Secret Messages


            : : Diesel : :

       =
     Diesel transforms to his robot mode.

            Diesel: I am Diesel.=


            He motions to the others.

            Diesel: This is Arrow =
and Deemos.
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From:=
 LurkerAbyss 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent:=
 Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:55 PM
              Subject: Re: Secret Messag=
es


                                                                      =
                                                 : : Sting : :

           =
                                                                           =
           He walks closer, and gets ready to speak.

                     =
                                                                           =
   Sting:  Hi.  It's Sting.  Who are you?
                ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
                From: RoboRick007 
                To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:53 PM
  =
              Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                : : Diesel : :=


                The dark tanker sees as this mysterious bot, Sting, drops=
 down infront of their convoy. He activates his breaks screeching to a stop=
.

                Diesel: Who are you, and what do you want?
             =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: LurkerAbyss 
   =
               To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Tuesday,=
 August 13, 2002 10:42 PM
                  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


=
                                                             : : Sting : :
=

                                      A mysterious, dark bot just happens =
to be decending from the sky, up ahead, and lands right in the path of Dies=
el, Arrow and Deemos.  He waits to see if they will see him and stop...
   =
                 ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: Ro=
boRick007 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                =
    Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:31 PM
                    Subject: Re=
: Secret Messages


                    : : Diesel : :

                   =
 Diesel pulls out, following the others towards their destination.
        =
              ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: Hol=
lywood Narrator 
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        =
              Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 9:47 PM
                      =
Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                      Arrow transforms into =
a motorcycle. He whips around on a dime and speeds towards the destination.=
 Deems transforms into a mechanical vulture and flies along behind...

    =
                    ----- Original Message -----
                        Fr=
om: RoboRick007
                        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
        =
                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 2:29 PM
                    =
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                        : : Diesel : :

=
                        He smiled at his friends excitment.

              =
          Diesel: Alright lets go get our ship. And maybe, just maybe, we g=
et to kill some bots doing it!

                        Diesel transformes =
to his fuel truck mode.

                        Diesel: Roll out!

       =
                 He drives out and pulls to the side waiting for Arrow to l=
ead the way.
